creator: davidw@apache.org
text:
The current setup with a separate Makefile for mod_websh is no
good. In stead of "Modify/Adapt" one could write "Cleanup": make sure
the rules work, change the all rule to include mod_websh and so on.

creator: davidw@apache.org
text:
I can do 

make_websh.so

and it seems to work just fine.
